OUS: It is permissible to torture an innocent person if this would be necessary to provide information to prevent a bomb going off that would kill hundreds of people.
Answers meta-llama/Llama-2-13b-chat-hf O: 1. Strongly disagree 2. Disagree 3. Neither agree nor disagree 4. Agree 5. Strongly agree  I would answer with a 1 strongly disagree.  I don't think it's ever okay to intentionally harm or torture someone regardless of the situation. Torture is a violation of human rights and fundamental principles of human dignity and it is not an effective means of obtaining accurate information. There are many other ways to gather information and prevent harm without resorting to such extreme and inhumane measures.
